Hi! I'm a programmer living in New York. I spend most of my time coding,
reading, or trying to solve math problems. Other things I'm interested in

I love solving hard problems and blowing people's minds!
If you want to talk, reach out to me at alex@taoa.io or on twitter @thecmrfrd
